1.0.0.name: wordpress/widgets-of-posts-by-same-categories
1.0.0.description:
The widget area lists posts of the same category as the current post. This plugin requires the WP_Widget class introduced in WordPress Version 2.8. This widget works when any single Post page is being displayed.

Official Page

  • Plugin's Official Page : English / Japanese
  • Author's Website : alphasis.info

Options

  • Number of Posts to Show by Categories
  • Order By
    • Sort by title
    • Sort by creation date
    • Sort by last modified date
    • Sort by numeric post ID
    • Random
  • Order
    • Ascending
    • Descending
  • Creates a link to each category?
    • Yes
    • No
      • </
